subsection.name: December 9, 2004 - New style for the website
subsection.p: Our new layout, design and logo were kindly provided by Topicus by providing precious time of their designer Wouter de Jong.

subsection.name: December 5, 2004 - 0.9.14-alpha released
subsection.p: The current status of CVS was released under version 0.9.14-alpha.

subsection.name: November 7, 2004 - Clover license obtained
subsection.p: We have obtained a Clover license for use in our project. This allows us to obtain even higher quality code than before. Thanks to Cenqua for providing us with the open source license.

subsection.name: October 25, 2004 - 0.9.13-alpha released
subsection.p: The current status of CVS was released under version 0.9.13-alpha.

subsection.name: September 22, 2004 - Moved to sourceforge.net
subsection.p: Wicket moved from codehaus to SourceForge.
